original: bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhe'am /
translated: ‘I will practice to attain the fruit of non-returning,’

original: bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am /
translated: ‘I will practice to attain arhatship,’

original: bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do zhe'am /
translated: ‘I am an arhat,’

original: bdag gis rang byang chub la spyad par bya'o zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gis rang byang chub la spyad par bya'o zhe'am /
translated: ‘I will practice to attain individual enlightenment,’

original: bdag gi rang byang chub bo zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gi rang byang chub bo zhe'am /
translated: ‘I am a pratyekabuddha,’

original: bdag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am /
translated: ‘I will practice to attain the knowledge of the aspects of the path,’

original: bdag gi lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gi lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do zhe'am /
translated: ‘I am the knowledge of the aspects of the path,’

original: bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad par bya'o zhe'am /
translated: ‘I will practice to attain the knowledge of all aspects,’

original: bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhe'am /
translated: ‘I am the knowledge of all aspects,’🔽‘I will practice to attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,’

original: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spyad par bya'o zhe'am /
analyzed: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spyad par bya'o zhe'am /
translated: ‘I am unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,’

original: bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bya bar bdag dang / bdag gir byed pa med de; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni /
analyzed: bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bya bar bdag dang / bdag gir byed pa med de; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni /
translated: The enlightenment of bodhisattva great beings

original: 'dzin pa la mi spyod /
analyzed: 'dzin pa la mi spyod /
translated: does not engage with grasping,

original: mi 'dzin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: mi 'dzin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: nor does it engage with non-grasping.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: if the enlightenment of bodhisattva great beings does not engage with grasping,

original: mi 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod na /
analyzed: mi 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod na /
translated: nor does it engage with non-grasping,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ci la spyod pa lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ci la spyod pa lags /
translated: then what does the enlightenment of bodhisattva great beings engage with?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa'am /🔽mi 'dzin @221a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa'am / mi 'dzin @221a *//
translated: Is the enlightenment of a thus-gone one’s emanation something that engages with grasping,

original: pa'am; ci la'ang spyod pa yod dam /
analyzed: pa'am; ci la'ang spyod pa yod dam /
translated: non-grasping, or anything at all?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni / ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni / ma lags so //
translated: it is not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “What do you think, Subhūti?

original: dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am /
translated: Do you think that the mind of an arhat in a dream

original: mi 'dzin pa gang la'ang spyod dam /
analyzed: mi 'dzin pa gang la'ang spyod dam /
translated: engages with something that is apprehended or not apprehended?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni / ma lags te /
analyzed: de ni / ma lags te /
translated: it does not.

original: bcom ldan 'das; dgra bcom pa la yong yang nyal ba ma mchis na /🔽de'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am /🔽mi 'dzin pa la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das; dgra bcom pa la yong yang nyal ba ma mchis na / de'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am / mi 'dzin pa la /
translated: Blessed One, if an arhat does not even sleep,🔽how could the mind of an arhat in a dream

original: spyod par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis /
analyzed: spyod par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis /
translated: engage with something that is apprehended or not apprehended?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyang 'dzin pa'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyang 'dzin pa'am /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: mi 'dzin pa la spyod pa med do //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das; gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: mi 'dzin pa la spyod pa med do // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das; gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, the awakening of bodhisattva great beings does not engage with something that is apprehended or not apprehended.”

original: mi 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: mi 'dzin pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: He said, “Blessed One, if the awakening of bodhisattva great beings does not engage with something that is apprehended or not apprehended,

original: gzugs la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs la'ang mi spyod /
translated: does not engage with form,

original: tshor ba la'ang mi spyod; 'du shes la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: tshor ba la'ang mi spyod; 'du shes la'ang mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with perceptions,

original: 'du byed la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: 'du byed la'ang mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with formative predispositions,

original: rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: and they do not engage with consciousness.

original: mig la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: mig la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the eyes,

original: rna ba la'ang mi spyod /🔽sna la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rna ba la'ang mi spyod / sna la'ang mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with the ears,🔽they do not engage with the nose,

original: lce la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: lce la'ang mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with the tongue,

original: lus la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: lus la'ang mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with the body,

original: yid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: yid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: and they do not engage with the mental faculty.

original: gzugs la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with sights,

original: sgra la'ang mi spyod /🔽dri la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: sgra la'ang mi spyod / dri la'ang mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with sounds,🔽they do not engage with odors,🔽they do not engage with tastes,

original: ro la'ang mi spyod /🔽reg la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: ro la'ang mi spyod / reg la'ang mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with tangibles,

original: chos la'ang mi spyod /🔽mig gi @221b rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: chos la'ang mi spyod / mig gi @221b rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: and they do not engage with mental phenomena.🔽They do not engage with the sensory element of the eyes,🔽they do not engage with the sensory element of sights,🔽and they do not engage with the sensory element of visual consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /🔽sna'i rnam pa shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod / sna'i rnam pa shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the sensory element of the ears,🔽they do not engage with the sensory element of sounds,🔽and they do not engage with the sensory element of auditory consciousness.🔽They do not engage with the sensory element of the nose,🔽they do not engage with the sensory element of odors,🔽and they do not engage with the sensory element of olfactory consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the sensory element of the tongue,🔽they do not engage with the sensory element of tastes,🔽and they do not engage with the sensory element of gustatory consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the sensory element of the body,🔽they do not engage with the sensory element of tangibles,🔽and they do not engage with the sensory element of tactile consciousness.🔽They do not engage with the sensory element of the mental faculty,🔽they do not engage with the sensory element of mental phenomena,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: and they do not engage with the sensory element of mental consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the sensory element of the visual faculty,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the composite of contact at the ear.🔽They do not engage with the composite of contact at the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the composite of contact at the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the composite of contact at the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the composite of contact at the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the eye.🔽They do not engage with the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the ear.🔽They do not engage with the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the mind.

original: sa'i khams la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: sa'i khams la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the earth element.

original: chu'i khams la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: chu'i khams la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the water element.

original: me'i khams la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: me'i khams la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rlung gi khams la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the element of space.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the element of consciousness.

original: ma rig pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: ma rig pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with ignorance.

original: 'du byed la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: 'du byed la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with name and form.

original: skye mched drug la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: skye mched drug la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the six sense sources.

original: reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: reg pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with contact.

original: tshor ba la'ang mi spyod /🔽sred pa @222a *//🔽la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: tshor ba la'ang mi spyod / sred pa @222a *// la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with feeling.🔽They do not engage with craving.

original: len pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: len pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with appropriation.

original: srid pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: srid pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with existence.

original: skye ba la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: skye ba la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with birth.

original: rga shi la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rga shi la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the perfection of ethical discipline.🔽They do not engage with the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod /🔽nang stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi spyod / nang stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the perfection of wisdom.🔽They do not engage with inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of non-entities.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /🔽@222b yang dag par spong ba bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod / @222b yang dag par spong ba bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the four applications of mindfulness.🔽They do not engage with the four correct exertions.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /🔽dbang po lnga la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod / dbang po lnga la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the four legs of manifestation.🔽They do not engage with the five faculties.

original: stobs lnga la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: stobs lnga la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the seven branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the four noble truths.

original: bsam gtan bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the four concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the four immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, or the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la'ang mi spyod; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la'ang mi spyod; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the dhāraṇī gateways. They do not engage with the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen po la'ang mi spyod; snying rje chen po la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: byams pa chen po la'ang mi spyod; snying rje chen po la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with great love. They do not engage with great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang mi spyod /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la'ang mi spyod /🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang mi spyod / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la'ang mi spyod / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽They do not engage with the result of stream enterer.🔽They do not engage with the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: they do not practice for the state of a worthy one;

original: rang byang chub la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: rang byang chub la'ang mi spyod /
translated: they do not practice for a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la'ang mi spyod /
translated: they do not practice for the knowledge of path aspects;

original: @223a *// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang mi spyod na /
analyzed: @223a *// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang mi spyod na /
translated: and they do not practice for the knowledge of all aspects,

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod /
translated: then how do bodhisattva great beings practice the six perfections?

original: stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /
translated: How do they practice the fourteen emptinesses, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the three gateways to liberation, all the concentrations, liberations, meditative stabilizations, and meditative absorptions,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod /
translated: and the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bgyis /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bgyis /
translated: They will complete the ten bodhisattva stages.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas /
translated: They will abide in the five superknowledges.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs /
translated: They will enter the bodhisattvas’ faultless state.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gyis /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gyis /
translated: They will purify a buddhafield.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bgyis /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bgyis /
translated: They will bring beings to maturity.

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su bsgrubs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su bsgrubs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
translated: They will accomplish the thirty-two major marks and the eighty minor marks of a great person and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug lam spyad /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug lam spyad /
translated: they will practice the six perfections,

original: stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la ma spyad /
analyzed: stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la ma spyad /
translated: they will not practice the fourteen emptinesses,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la ma spyad /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la ma spyad /
translated: they will not practice the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum lam spyad /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum lam spyad /
translated: they will practice the three doors of liberation,

original: bsam @223b gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad lam spyad /
analyzed: bsam @223b gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad lam spyad /
translated: they will practice all the concentrations, liberations, samādhis, and absorptions,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lam spyad /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lam spyad /
translated: They have practiced the path of the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la ma spyad; so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma spyad /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la ma spyad; so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma spyad /
translated: but not the path of the four fearlessnesses, and not the path of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po lam spyad /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po lam spyad /
translated: They have practiced the path of great love and great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma spyad /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma spyad /
translated: but not the path of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis /
translated: They have not completed the ten bodhisattva stages.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga la ma gnas /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga la ma gnas /
translated: They have not remained in the five kinds of clairvoyance.

original: byang chub sems dpa' skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs /
translated: They have not entered into the bodhisattva faultlessness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma bgyis /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma bgyis /
translated: They have not purified a buddhafield.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma bgyis /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma bgyis /
translated: They have not brought beings to maturity.

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su ma bsgrubs par ni; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su ma bsgrubs par ni; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so //
translated: They have not accomplished the thirty-two major marks and eighty minor marks of a great person. They are not able to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”🔽“Lord, what is the bodhisattva great beings’ faultlessness?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no; ;de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no; ;de bzhin te /
translated: “Subhūti, it is so, it is so.

original: ji skad du smras pa bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par ma byas /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par ma byas /
translated: If the perfection of giving is not fulfilled,

original: stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /
translated: the fourteen emptinesses, the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment, the three doors of liberation, all the concentrations, liberations, absorptions, and attainments,

original: de bzhin @224a *//
analyzed: de bzhin @224a *//
translated: and likewise

original: gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par ma byas /
analyzed: gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par ma byas /
translated: the ten powers of the Tathāgata, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha are not fulfilled.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: The ten bodhisattva grounds are not completed.

original: mngon par shas pa lnga la ma gnas /
analyzed: mngon par shas pa lnga la ma gnas /
translated: One does not abide in the five superknowledges.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs /
translated: without having entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas /
translated: without having purified a buddhafield,

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas /
translated: without having matured sentient beings,

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu yongs su ma bsgrubs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu yongs su ma bsgrubs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te /
translated: without having accomplished the thirty-two major marks and eighty minor marks of a great person, they cannot fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings have completed the six perfections,

original: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
translated: have completed all the emptinesses, the four establishments in mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven parts of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par @224b 'jug pa thams cad dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par @224b 'jug pa thams cad dang /
translated: all the concentrations, liberations, meditative stabilizations, and absorptions,🔽the ten powers of the tathāgatas,🔽the four fearlessnesses,🔽the four detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽great love,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas /
translated: great compassion,🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽and the ten bodhisattva levels.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs /
translated: They remained in the five kinds of clairvoyance and entered into the bodhisattvas’ faultlessness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
translated: They purified a buddhafield.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas /
translated: They brought beings to maturity.

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su bsgrubs /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su bsgrubs /
translated: and the thirty-two major marks and eighty minor marks of a great person.

original: mi nyams pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi nyams pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having perfected the nature of non-forgetfulness and the constant practice of equanimity, they will attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas /🔽tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas / tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: Subhūti, that is based on the nature of form,🔽based on the nature of feeling,

original: 'du shes kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: based on the nature of perception,

original: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: based on the nature of formation,

original: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: based on the nature of consciousness,

original: mig gi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: mig gi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: based on the nature of the eyes,

original: rna ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽sna'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rna ba'i rang bzhin la gnas / sna'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: based on the nature of the ears,🔽based on the nature of the nose,

original: lce'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: lce'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: based on the nature of the tongue,

original: lus kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: lus kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: based on the nature of the body,

original: yid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: yid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: based on the nature of the mind,

original: gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: based on the nature of form,

original: sgra'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: sgra'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: based on the nature of sound,

original: dri'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: dri'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: based on the nature of smell,

original: ro'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽reg gi rang @225a *//
analyzed: ro'i rang bzhin la gnas / reg gi rang @225a *//
translated: They abide in the nature of smell.

original: bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of touch.

original: chos kyi rang bzhin la gnas /🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin la gnas / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of mental phenomena.🔽They abide in the nature of eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of ear consciousness.🔽They abide in the nature of nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of eye contact.🔽They abide in the nature of ear contact.🔽They abide in the nature of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the ear.🔽He abides in the nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the mind.

original: sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the water element.

original: me'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas /🔽rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas / rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the fire element.🔽He abides in the nature of the wind element.

original: @225b nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: @225b nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of formation.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of name and form.

original: skye mched drug gi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the six sense sources.

original: reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of contact.

original: tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽sred pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas / sred pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of feeling.🔽He abides in the nature of craving.

original: len pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽srid pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: len pa'i rang bzhin la gnas / srid pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of grasping.🔽He abides in the nature of becoming.

original: skye ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: skye ba'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of birth.

original: rga shi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rga shi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of aging and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the perfection of discipline.🔽He abides in the nature of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: He abides in the nature of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of external emptiness.🔽They abide in the nature of the emptiness of the external and the internal.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽They abide in the nature of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la @226a *//
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la @226a *//
translated: They abide in the nature of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽They abide in the nature of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: gnas; thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: gnas; thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.🔽They abide in the nature of the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the emptiness of non-entities.🔽They abide in the nature of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas / dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the four legs of miraculous power.🔽They abide in the nature of the five faculties.

original: stobs lnga'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: stobs lnga'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the seven branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽bsam gtan bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin la gnas / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas / bsam gtan bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the noble eightfold path.🔽They abide in the nature of the four noble truths.🔽They abide in the nature of the four concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: They abide in the nature of the four immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they abide in the nature of the four formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they abide in the nature of the eight aspects of liberation,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they abide in the nature of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma @226b med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma @226b med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they abide in the nature of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they abide in the nature of the higher cognitions,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they abide in the nature of the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin la gnas; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin la gnas; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they abide in the nature of the dhāraṇī gateways, they abide in the nature of the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they abide in the nature of the four assurances,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas /🔽byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas / byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they abide in the nature of the four kinds of exact knowledge,🔽they abide in the nature of great love,

original: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they abide in the nature of great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: and they abide in the nature of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they stand in the nature of the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they stand in the nature of the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they stand in the nature of the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they stand in the nature of the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they stand in the nature of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas /
translated: they stand in the nature of the knowledge of path aspects,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin la gnas te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin la gnas te /
translated: and they stand in the nature of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: Bodhisattva great beings fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rang bzhin de'ang nye bar zhi ba ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin de'ang nye bar zhi ba ste /
translated: That nature is also completely pacified.

original: chos gang yang 'phel bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: chos gang yang 'phel bar byed pa'am /
translated: There is no dharma that is increased

original: 'grib par byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'grib par byed pa'am /
translated: or decreased,

original: skye ba'am / 'gag pa'am /
analyzed: skye ba'am / 'gag pa'am /
translated: arisen, or ceased,

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
translated: or defiled

original: rnam par byang ba'am /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'am /
translated: or purified.

original: thob pa'am / mngon par rdzogs par byed pa med de /🔽de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad @227a *//
analyzed: thob pa'am / mngon par rdzogs par byed pa med de / de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad @227a *//
translated: there is no attainment and no clear realization.🔽Moreover, this is a conventional designation

original: du btags pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na /
analyzed: du btags pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na /
translated: in terms of the dharmatā that is imputed in the world.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: Bodhisattva great beings fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: don dam par ni /
analyzed: don dam par ni /
translated: In the ultimate,🔽there is no form,

analyzed: gzugs sam / tshor ba'am /
translated: no feeling,

original: 'du shes sam /
analyzed: 'du shes sam /
translated: no perception,

original: 'du byed dam /
analyzed: 'du byed dam /
translated: no volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: and no consciousness;🔽no eyes,

original: mig gam / rna ba'am /
analyzed: mig gam / rna ba'am /
translated: no ears,🔽no nose,

original: sna'am / lce'am /
analyzed: sna'am / lce'am /
translated: no tongue,🔽no body,

analyzed: lus sam / yid dam /

analyzed: gzugs sam / sgra'am /

analyzed: dri'am / ro'am /
translated: no taste,🔽no texture,

analyzed: reg gam / chos sam /
translated: and no dharmas;

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'am /

analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am / sna'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: no ear consciousness,🔽no nose consciousness,

analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: no tongue consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: no body consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: and no mind consciousness;

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am /
translated: no eye contact,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
translated: no ear contact,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am; lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am; lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
translated: the tongue sense-sphere,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am /

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am /

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact,🔽the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: and the feeling that arises from the condition of mental contact,

analyzed: sa'i khams sam /

original: chu'i khams sam /
analyzed: chu'i khams sam /

translated: the fire element,🔽the wind element,

analyzed: nam mkha'i khams sam /

analyzed: rnam par @227b shes pa'i khams sam /

analyzed: ma reg pa'am /
translated: non-contact,

analyzed: 'du byed dam /
translated: formations,

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: consciousness,

original: ming dang gzugs sam /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs sam /
translated: name-and-form,

analyzed: skye mched drug gam /

analyzed: reg pa'am / tshor ba'am /
translated: contact, feeling,

analyzed: sred pa'am / len pa'am; srid pa'am /

analyzed: skye ba'am / rga shi'am /

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am /

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am /

translated: the perfection of perseverance,

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
translated: the perfection of meditative concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
translated: the perfection of wisdom,

original: nang stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dam /
translated: inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dam /
translated: outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dam /
translated: inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid dam /🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid dam /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dam / don dam pa stong pa nyid dam / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam /
translated: great emptiness,🔽ultimate emptiness,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam /

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam /

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of nonrejection,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam /

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam /

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of nonapprehension,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam /

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature of nonthings,🔽the applications of mindfulness,

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam; yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
translated: the right efforts,

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
translated: the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po rnams sam /
analyzed: dbang po rnams sam /
translated: the faculties,

original: stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: stobs rnams sam /
translated: the powers,

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam / 'phags pa'i @228a *//
translated: the branches of enlightenment,

original: lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
analyzed: lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
translated: the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam /
translated: the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams sam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sam /
translated: the meditative stabilities,

original: tshad med pa rnams sam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams sam /
translated: the immeasurable aspirations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the formless meditative stabilizations,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the serial absorptions,🔽the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams sam /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam /

analyzed: byams pa chen po'am /

original: snying rje chen po'am /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'am /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dam /
translated: the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,
