analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
translated: the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub bam /
analyzed: rang byang chub bam /
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam /
translated: the knowledge of path aspects,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam /
translated: or unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gang byang chub tu spyod pa'i chos de lta bu'ang med de /
analyzed: gang byang chub tu spyod pa'i chos de lta bu'ang med de /
translated: There is no phenomenon that is practiced for awakening.

original: chos de dag thams cad ni /🔽'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: chos de dag thams cad ni / 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste /
translated: All those phenomena

original: btags pa yin gyi; don dam bar ni /
analyzed: btags pa yin gyi; don dam bar ni /
translated: are designations that are taken to be mundane conventions,

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: but not ultimately.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub tu spyod kyang sems de dag mi @228b dmigs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub tu spyod kyang sems de dag mi @228b dmigs te /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings, having taken up the first production of the thought of awakening, practice for awakening, but do not apprehend those thoughts.

original: sems can rnams kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang mi dmigs /
translated: They do not apprehend beings.

original: byang chub kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub kyang mi dmigs /
translated: They do not apprehend awakening.

original: sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs /
translated: They do not apprehend buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend bodhisattvas.🔽“Subhūti, what do you think? When you obtained the faculties in order to abandon the view of the transitory collection,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems; gang gi tshe rab 'byor khyod kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang ba'i phyir dbang po rnams thob par gyur pa dang / bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin tam /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems; gang gi tshe rab 'byor khyod kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang ba'i phyir dbang po rnams thob par gyur pa dang / bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin tam /
translated: did you apprehend the uninterrupted meditative stabilization,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am /
translated: the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of non-returner,🔽or the state of a worthy one?

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa de'i tshe rmi lam mam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa de'i tshe rmi lam mam /
translated: Did you apprehend a dream,

original: sems sam / lam mam /
analyzed: sems sam / lam mam /
translated: a thought, a path,

original: 'bras bu dmigs par 'gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: 'bras bu dmigs par 'gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or a result?”

original: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said,🔽“Bhagavān,

original: de ni / ma lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de ni / ma lags so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Subhūti replied, “No, Blessed One, it is not.”

original: 'o na / ji ltar khyod rab 'byor gyis dgra bcom pa thob bo zhes bya bar bka' stsal te lung bstan par gyur /
analyzed: 'o na / ji ltar khyod rab 'byor gyis dgra bcom pa thob bo zhes bya bar bka' stsal te lung bstan par gyur /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Well then, how is it that I have declared and proclaimed that Subhūti has attained the state of an arhat?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Blessed One,

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste bkas lung bstan to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste bkas lung bstan to //
translated: I was declared and proclaimed by you in terms of worldly convention.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: in the same way, a bodhisattva is also designated in terms of worldly convention.

original: gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Form is also designated in terms of worldly convention.🔽Feeling is also designated in terms of worldly convention.

original: 'du shes kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Perception is also designated in terms of worldly convention.

original: 'du byed kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Disposition is also designated in terms of worldly convention.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad @229a *//🔽du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad @229a *//🔽du btags pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is also designated in terms of worldly convention.

original: mig kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: mig kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The eye is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: rna ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽sna'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // sna'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The ear is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.🔽The nose is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: lce'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: lce'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The tongue is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: lus kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The body is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: yid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The mind is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Form is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: sgra'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽dri'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽ro'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // dri'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // ro'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Sound is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.🔽Smell is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.🔽Taste is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: reg kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: reg kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Tactile objects are also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: chos kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Phenomena are also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Eye consciousness is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Ear consciousness is also a conventional designation in the world.🔽Nose consciousness is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Tongue consciousness is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Body consciousness is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Mind consciousness is also a conventional designation in the world.🔽Eye contact is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Ear contact is also a conventional designation in the world.🔽Nose contact is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang @229b 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang @229b 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Tongue contact is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Body contact is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Mind-contact is also a designation used in the conventions of the world.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of eye-contact is also a designation used in the conventions of the world.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of ear-contact is also a designation used in the conventions of the world.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of nose-contact is also a designation used in the conventions of the world.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of tongue-contact is also a designation used in the conventions of the world.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of body-contact is also a designation used in the conventions of the world.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of mind-contact is also a designation used in the conventions of the world.

original: sa'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The earth element is also a designation used in the conventions of the world.

original: chu'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The water element is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: me'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽rlung gi khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: me'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // rlung gi khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The fire element is also a conventional designation in the world.🔽The wind element is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The space element is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The consciousness element is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: ma rig pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o; ;'du byed kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o; ;'du byed kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Ignorance is also a conventional designation in the world. Formations are also a conventional designation in the world.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: ming dang gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags @230a *//
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags @230a *//
translated: Name and form are also a conventional designation in the world.

original: pa'o; ;skye mched drug kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: pa'o; ;skye mched drug kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The six sense sources are also a conventional designation in the world.

original: reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Contact is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽sred pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // sred pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Feeling is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.🔽Craving is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: len pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: len pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Clinging is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.🔽Becoming is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: srid pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o; ;skye ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o; ;skye ba'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Birth is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: rga shi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Aging and death are also designations in terms of worldly convention.🔽The perfection of generosity is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The perfection of moral discipline is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.🔽The perfection of patience is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The perfection of perseverance is also a designation in terms of worldly convention.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditative stability is also a conventional term.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // nang stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is also a conventional term.🔽Inner emptiness is also a conventional term.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Outer emptiness is also a conventional term.🔽Inner and outer emptiness is also a conventional term.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is also a conventional term.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽@230b don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // @230b don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Great emptiness is also a conventional term.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is also a conventional term.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brtags pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brtags pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is also a conventional term.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o; ;mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o; ;mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of what transcends limits is also designated in terms of worldly convention.🔽The emptiness of no beginning and no end is also designated in terms of worldly convention.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of nonrepudiation is also designated in terms of worldly convention.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of nature is also designated in terms of worldly convention.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is also designated in terms of worldly convention.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o; ;rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o; ;rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of specific characteristics is also designated in terms of worldly convention.🔽The emptiness of nonapprehension is also designated in terms of worldly convention.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of nonthings is also designated in terms of worldly convention.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are also conventional designations in the world.🔽The right efforts are also conventional designations in the world.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽dbang po lnga'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // dbang po lnga'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The bases of supernatural power are also conventional designations in the world.🔽The five faculties are also conventional designations in the world.

original: stobs lnga'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽byang chub kyi @231a *//
analyzed: stobs lnga'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // byang chub kyi @231a *//
translated: The five powers are also conventional designations in the world.

original: yan lag bdun kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag bdun kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The seven factors of awakening are also conventional designations in the world.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path is also a conventional designation in the world.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brtags pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brtags pa'o //
translated: The four noble truths are also imputed in terms of worldly convention.

original: bsam gtan bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽tshad med pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // tshad med pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The four concentrations are also imputed in terms of worldly convention.🔽The four immeasurables are also imputed in terms of worldly convention.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The four formless absorptions are also imputed in terms of worldly convention.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The eight aspects of liberation are also imputed in terms of worldly convention.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The nine serial absorptions are also imputed in terms of worldly convention.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are also imputed in terms of worldly convention.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The higher perceptions are also imputed in terms of worldly convention.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The meditative stabilities are also imputed in terms of worldly convention.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are also designations in worldly convention.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas are also designations in worldly convention.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The four fearlessnesses are also designations in worldly convention.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽byams pa chen po'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // byams pa chen po'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges are also designations in worldly convention.🔽Great love is also a designation in worldly convention.

original: snying rje chen po'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: Great compassion is also a designation in worldly convention.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos @231b ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos @231b ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are also designations in worldly convention.🔽The result of stream enterer is also a designation in worldly convention.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: The result of once-returner is also a designation in worldly convention.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: the fruit of non-returning is also a designation in worldly convention,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyis tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyis tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: the state of a worthy one is also a designation in worldly convention,

original: rang byang chub kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is also a designation in worldly convention,

original: lam gyi rnam ba shes pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam ba shes pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects is also a designation in worldly convention,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is also a designation in worldly convention.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings

original: chos gang la'ang 'phel bar byed pa'am /🔽'grib par byed pa'am /
analyzed: chos gang la'ang 'phel bar byed pa'am / 'grib par byed pa'am /
translated: do not apprehend any dharma at all that increases🔽or decreases,🔽or that is helpful

original: phan 'dogs pa'am /🔽gnod par byed pa de lta bu gang yang ma dmigs te /
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa'am / gnod par byed pa de lta bu gang yang ma dmigs te /
translated: or harmful.

original: chos kyi rang bzhin nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos kyi rang bzhin de'ang ma dmigs na /
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos kyi rang bzhin de'ang ma dmigs na /
translated: When the intrinsic nature of dharmas is apprehended, that intrinsic nature of dharmas is not apprehended,

original: sems dang po bskyed pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: so what need is there to mention apprehending the first production of the thought?

original: de ni / gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni / gnas med do //
translated: That is impossible.

original: sa bcu'i bar du dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: sa bcu'i bar du dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: How could it be the object of the ten levels?

original: de ni / gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni / gnas med do //
translated: It is not tenable.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: How could the perfection of generosity be an object?

original: de ni / gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni / gnas med do //
translated: It is not tenable.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci @232a *//🔽smos to; de ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci @232a *// smos to; de ni /
translated: How could the perfection of ethical discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom be objects?

original: gnas med do //
analyzed: gnas med do //
translated: It is not tenable.

original: nang stong pa nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: How could inner emptiness be an object?

original: de ni / gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni / gnas med do //
translated: It is not tenable.

original: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang / tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang / tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the external, the emptiness of the internal and the external, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of inherent identity, the emptiness of non-existent things, and the emptiness of the inherent identity of non-existent things.

original: de ni / gnas med do; ;dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: de ni / gnas med do; ;dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: How could the four establishments of mindfulness be observed?

original: de ni / gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni / gnas med do //
translated: That is impossible.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: How could the four right efforts be observed?

original: de ni; gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni; gnas med do //
translated: That is impossible.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: How could the four legs of miraculous power be observed?

original: de ni / gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni / gnas med do //
translated: That is impossible.

original: dbang po lnga dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: dbang po lnga dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: How could the five faculties be observed?

original: de ni; gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni; gnas med do //
translated: That is impossible.

analyzed: stobs lnga dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: How could the five powers be observed?

original: de ni / gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni / gnas med do //
translated: That is impossible.

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: How could the seven aspects of awakening be observed?

original: de ni / gnas med do //

original: de ni / gnas med do //

original: de ni / gnas med do //

original: de ni / gnas med do //

original: de ni / gnas med do //

translated: That is impossible.”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings practice for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, and having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they work for the welfare of beings.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag @233b brgya ba las /

original: bam po nyis brgya gya dgu pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya gya dgu pa //
translated: Volume 299

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord!

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la spyod pa dang /
translated: If bodhisattva great beings practice the six perfections, practice the fourteen emptinesses, practice the thirty-seven factors of awakening, practice the three doors of liberation,

original: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang /
translated: practice all the concentrations, liberations, absorptions, and attainments, practice the four noble truths, practice the superknowledges, practice the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang /
translated: practice the dhāraṇī gateways, practice the ten powers of the tathāgatas, practice the four fearlessnesses, practice the four detailed and thorough knowledges, practice great love,

original: snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pas /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pas /
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba ma mchis na /
analyzed: byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba ma mchis na /
translated: and even though they have completed the path to enlightenment, they do not have the good fortune to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

element of the mind, the sensory element of mental

original: rab 'byor / nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po dang / len pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po dang / len pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom practice the perfection of generosity with skillful means, they do not apprehend generosity, a giver, or a recipient.

original: chos de dag las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
analyzed: chos de dag las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not practice other than those dharmas,

original: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te /
translated: at that time bodhisattva great beings will attain the path to awakening.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that,

original: thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening with skillful means.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: or one who has morality,

original: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
analyzed: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
translated: or even anything other than those two dharmas.

original: de'i 'tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i 'tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te /
translated: When they practice like that, bodhisattva great beings will attain the path to awakening.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar @234b spyod na; thabs mkhas pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar @234b spyod na; thabs mkhas pas /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that, they will, through skill in means,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang bzod pa dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /

original: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /

analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas attain the path to enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
translated: Subhūti, when Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom in that way,

analyzed: thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment through skillful means.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are practicing the perfection of perseverance, they practice the perfection of perseverance without apprehending perseverance or one who perseveres.

original: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
analyzed: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
translated: They do not practice apart from those two dharmas.

original: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, bodhisattva great beings attain the path to awakening.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that,

original: thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening through skillful means.

translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they practice the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, but they do not apprehend meditative concentration or one who is absorbed in meditation.

original: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
analyzed: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom yang shes rab dang / shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /

translated: Moreover, Subhūti, when Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom, they cultivate the perfection of wisdom without apprehending wisdom or one who possesses wisdom.

original: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
analyzed: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not engage in anything other than these two dharmas,

translated: Subhūti, when Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom in this way,

analyzed: thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //

translated: Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom cultivate great love, they do not apprehend great love,

original: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
analyzed: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
translated: nor do they practice other than those two dharmas.

original: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, bodhisattva great beings attain the path to awakening.

original: rab 'byor; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
analyzed: rab 'byor; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that,

original: thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening through skillful means.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po sgom yang snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po sgom pa'ang mi dmigs /

translated: Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom cultivate great compassion, they do not apprehend great compassion,

original: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
analyzed: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
translated: nor do they practice other than those two dharmas.

original: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, bodhisattva great beings attain the path to awakening.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom in that way,

analyzed: thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par @244b 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening through skillful means.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sgom pa'ang mi dmigs /

analyzed: chos de gnyis las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not practice in a way that apprehends those two dharmas,

translated: then at that time bodhisattva great beings will attain the path to awakening.

analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom in that way,

analyzed: thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening through skillful means.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatī­putra asked the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi lam la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi lam la brtson par bgyid pa lags /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas gzugs mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas gzugs mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not join with or separate from form.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni / 'di ltar gang sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni / 'di ltar gang sbyor ba'am /

original: dbye bar bya ba'i gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: dbye bar bya ba'i gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do //

analyzed: tshor ba mi sbyor mi 'byed de /

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni / 'di ltar gang sbyor ba'am /
